languages.text: "Не все здесь такие непробиваемые оптимисты. Радуешься плошке супа, но вынужден выбирать, кому из трех детей она достанется. Говоришь, побои — пустое? Вспомни, как блюстители сломали тебе руку".

traits.locale_text: "Не все здесь такие непробиваемые оптимисты, как ты. Радуешься плошке супа, но вынужден выбирать, кому из трех детей она сегодня достанется. Говоришь, побои — пустое? Вспомни, как блюстители сломали тебе руку".

languages.text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"
languages.original_text: "Не все здесь такие непробиваемые оптимисты. Радуешься плошке супа, но вынужден выбирать, кому из трех детей она достанется. Говоришь, побои — пустое? Вспомни, как блюстители сломали тебе руку".

traits.locale_text: "Not everyone here is such an unbreakable optimist. You may be happy about that bowl of soup, but you have to choose which of the three kids gets it. Beatings are nothing, you say? Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

"Not everyone here is such an unbreakable optimist. You may be happy about that bowl of soup, but you have to choose which of the three kids gets it. Beatings are nothing, you say? Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

"Not everyone here is such an indomitable optimist. You may be think that bowl of soup is a generous gift, but you have to choose which of the three kids gets it. Beatings are nothing, you say? Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

"Not everyone here is such an indomitable optimist. You may be think that bowl of soup is a generous gift, but you have to choose which of the three kids gets it. Beatings are nothing, you say? Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

"Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

"Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

languages.text: "Nicht jeder hier ist so optimistisch und hat so ein dickes Fell wie Ihr. Eine Schale Suppe ist toll, sagt er. Und dass man entscheiden muss, welches von den drei Kindern sie kriegt, ist das auch toll? Prügel ist nichts, sagt er. Wisst Ihr noch, wie Euch die Enforcers den Arm gebrochen haben?"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

traits.locale_text: "Nicht jeder hier ist so optimistisch und hat so ein dickes Fell wie Ihr. Eine Schale Suppe ist toll, sagt er. Und dass man entscheiden muss, welches von den drei Kindern sie kriegt, ist das auch toll? Prügel ist nichts, sagt er. Wisst Ihr noch, wie Euch die Enforcers den Arm gebrochen haben?"

languages.text: «Aquí no todos somos tan optimistas y fuertes como tú. Que un bol de sopa es genial, dice. ¿Y qué pasa cuando tienes que elegir cuál de tus tres hijos se lo come? ¿También te parece genial? Y que las palizas no son nada. ¿Te acuerdas de cuando los guardias te partieron el brazo?».
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

traits.locale_text: «Aquí no todos somos tan optimistas y fuertes como tú. Que un bol de sopa es genial, dice. ¿Y qué pasa cuando tienes que elegir cuál de tus tres hijos se lo come? ¿También te parece genial? Y que las palizas no son nada. ¿Te acuerdas de cuando los guardias te partieron el brazo?».

languages.text: 「ここにいる誰もがお前のように元気で厚かましいってわけじゃない。あいつは、1杯のスープがあれば最高って言うよな。なら、3人の子供の誰が食べれるのかを選ばなければならない状況はどうだ？それでも素晴らしいってか？あいつは、殴られることぐらいなんてもないって言うよな。でも、エンフォーサーに腕の骨を折られた日のことを覚えているか？」
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

traits.locale_text: 「ここにいる誰もがお前のように元気で厚かましいってわけじゃない。あいつは、1杯のスープがあれば最高って言うよな。なら、3人の子供の誰が食べれるのかを選ばなければならない状況はどうだ？それでも素晴らしいってか？あいつは、殴られることぐらいなんてもないって言うよな。でも、エンフォーサーに腕の骨を折られた日のことを覚えているか？」

languages.text: “但并不是每个人都能像你心这么大，脸皮这么厚。你说一碗汤就挺好的，可如果汤只够一个人喝，可你有三个孩子，这也挺好的吗？你还说挨打不算什么大事，那你还记得执法者是怎么把你胳膊打断的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

traits.locale_text: “但并不是每个人都能像你心这么大，脸皮这么厚。你说一碗汤就挺好的，可如果汤只够一个人喝，可你有三个孩子，这也挺好的吗？你还说挨打不算什么大事，那你还记得执法者是怎么把你胳膊打断的吗？”

languages.text: « Tout le monde ici n'a pas la peau aussi dure que toi. Quoi, on devrait se réjouir d'avoir un bol de soupe ? Ah ben, c'est sûr que lui, il a pas à choisir lequel de ses trois enfants il pourra nourrir le soir. Les raclées qu'on se prend ne sont pas si terribles, qu'il dit. Tu te souviens de la fois où les prévôts t'ont cassé le bras ? »
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"

traits.locale_text: « Tout le monde ici n'a pas la peau aussi dure que toi. Quoi, on devrait se réjouir d'avoir un bol de soupe ? Ah ben, c'est sûr que lui, il a pas à choisir lequel de ses trois enfants il pourra nourrir le soir. Les raclées qu'on se prend ne sont pas si terribles, qu'il dit. Tu te souviens de la fois où les prévôts t'ont cassé le bras ? »

languages.text: "Buradaki herkes, senin gibi neşeli ve vurdumduymaz değil. Bir kâse çorba harikaymış. Peki üç çocuğundan hangisinin onu içeceğine karar vermek nasıl, o da harika mı? Yediğiniz dayak bir şey değilmiş. İnfazcıların kolunu kırdığı günü hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Not everyone here is as chipper and thick-skinned as you. A bowl of soup is great, he says. What about having to choose which of your three kids gets it — is that great too? Beatings are nothing, he says. Remember when the enforcers broke your arm?"
